meanings.sent1: The temporal changes in weather affect our daily plans.
meanings.sent2: The temporal nature of seasons brings about different activities.
meanings.sent3: His temporal jokes about time always make us laugh.
meanings.sent4: The temporal flow of moments is like a river that never stops.
meanings.sent5: She painted a vivid picture of the temporal progression of history.

meanings.sent1: The temporal relief from pain was short-lived.
meanings.sent2: The temporal joy of the holiday season fills our hearts.
meanings.sent3: Their temporal excitement over the new toy was contagious.
meanings.sent4: The temporal burst of colors in the sunset was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The temporal fireworks display lit up the night sky beautifully.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to worldly as opposed to spiritual affairs
meanings.sent1: His temporal concerns were focused on financial success.
meanings.sent2: The temporal pleasures of material possessions are fleeting.
meanings.sent3: She made a temporal decision to prioritize work over relaxation.
meanings.sent4: The temporal distractions of everyday life can cloud our minds.
meanings.sent5: The temporal pursuits of fame often lead to emptiness.

meanings.sent1: The temporal oversaw the construction of the new bridge.

meanings.sent4: The temporal's authority extended over the entire region.
meanings.sent5: The temporal's reign was marked by peace and prosperity.
